response: Yes, it is required to own a copy of the game to utilize our clients

regex: how can I open the console ingame
response:
Press the tilde key (~) or grave key (`) to enter console.
 https://i.imgur.com/drPaC0f.png

``/name WhateverNameYouWant`` on the in-game console.
You open the in-game console with the ~ or ` key (underneath ESC). If you're on a 60% keyboard it's Fn+ESC.
https://i.imgur.com/drPaC0f.png
Close your game, locate your Modern Warfare 2 game folder, and delete the `players` folder
